suite.name: CreateCharacters

kw.name: Run Keywords
kw.doc: Executes all the given keywords in a sequence.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: POST
kw.doc: Sends a POST request.
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://marvel.qaninja.academy/accounts path_url=/accounts headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.25.1', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '36', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"email": "toninhoaiaiai@gmail.com"}'

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: Set Suite Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.

kw.name: DELETE
kw.doc: Sends a DELETE request.
kw.msg: DELETE Request : url=http://marvel.qaninja.academy/delorean path_url=/delorean headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.25.1', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'client_key': '61df54ec3d94de0016bf38fb', 'Content-Length': '0'} body=None

kw.name: POST
kw.doc: Sends a POST request.
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://marvel.qaninja.academy/characters path_url=/characters headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.25.1', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'client_key': '61df54ec3d94de0016bf38fb', 'Content-Length': '85', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"name": "Abner", "aliases": "Abner", "age": 18, "team": "Goncalves", "active": true}'

kw.name: Status Should Be
kw.doc: Fails if response status code is different than the expected.
